description: This file defines a Java class 'Response' which extends 'Event' and represents a response in a mock Zigbee core request context. It includes an inner enum 'ZhalStatus' for status codes and several getter methods for response properties.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: A class representing a response event with request ID, result code, and response type, including status codes defined in the ZhalStatus enum.

classes.name: ZhalStatus
classes.description: An enumeration of status codes indicating different response states, such as OK, FAIL, TIMEOUT, etc.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Constructor initializing the Response object with request ID, result code, and response type.

methods.name: getRequestId
methods.description: Returns the request ID associated with the response.

methods.name: getResultCode
methods.description: Returns the result code indicating success or failure.

methods.name: getResponseType
methods.description: Returns the type of response as a string.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the integer value associated with the status in ZhalStatus.
